# MSMessagesAppPresentationStyle.transcript

**Case**

The iMessage app is displayed in the Messages app’s transcript or input field.

## Declaration

```swift
case transcript
```

## Presentation Styles

- **MSMessagesAppPresentationStyle.compact**: The iMessage App is displayed inside the keyboard area.
- **MSMessagesAppPresentationStyle.expanded**: The iMessage App expands to fill most of the screen.
